mapper.insert: insert into posts (title, content, status, sort, tag, uid, pid, createTime, updateTime) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{status}, #{sort}, #{tag}, #{uid}, #{pid}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update posts set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, status=#{status}, sort=#{sort}, tag=#{tag}, pid=#{pid}, updateTime=#{updateTime} where id = #{id}
